title: Mac League client
body: I updated my league client a few days ago to the latest patch (i'm playing on a mac) and your client has been bugging out ever since, and i've been banned for it! In the New beta client it was having trouble logging in and once it logged in after many attempts, it would not let me create a lobby to play with and it would come up with a trying to reconnect window. I then re-installed the old client and It's been crashing once the game starts to load after character select. Is there anything I can do to fix this?

replies.body: With the latest crash after champ select, are you seeing a specific error such as a Bugsplat or was it just throwing out general *network connectivity errors*?
